articles.title: India climb World Test Championship standings after triumph over Bangladesh - ICC Cricket
articles.description: India have boosted their chances of appearing at next year's ICC World Test Championship final with a comprehensive 188-run victory over a gritty Bangladesh in Chattogram on Sunday.
